General.Name: The Sandesh Limited
General.Description: The Sandesh Limited engages in editing, printing, and publishing newspapers and periodicals in India. It publishes SANDESH, a premier Gujarati daily newspaper; and operates Sandesh Telecast, a Gujarati news channel. The Sandesh Limited was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.

0.Name: Mr. Falgunbhai Chimanbhai Patel B.Com, M.B.A. (USA)
0.Title: Chairman & MD
